Purpose: Helping students with Learning Disorders (LDs) by offering remedial educational assistance and by training teachers to work with such students.

To enable academic success in students with Specific Learning Disabilities (SLDs) by teaching them strategies and skills using evidence-based instruction in individual and group settings; educating and supporting parents of children with SLDs; training teachers to identify students with SLDs and provide evidence-based interventions; supporting efforts of schools and other organizations to replicate our program; conduct research in developing tools that will further the cause of SLD.
